name: Puissance 4 (Ickise)
description:
The basic concept of Power 4 isn't mine, but we were instructed to make a game like tic-tac-toe, minesweeper, power 4, etc... a traditional game. I chose Power 4 and added sounds, animations, alternating turns, visual cues, etc... I could make it more juicy and fun, I will see.

Credits:

Enzo Dufour: Game Developper
